name: PerformActionOnMachineGroup
description: Perform actions like start, stop, delete on a machine group
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Subscription where the Resource Group is deployed. Optional for a pre-existing machine group.

inputs.name: MachineGroupName
inputs.label: Machine Group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the target machine group for performing the action.

inputs.name: Action
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: Action to be performed on the machines or machine group.

inputs.name: Filters
inputs.label: Filter Criteria
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a list of machine names like MyMachine1, MyMachine2 or tags like Role:DB;OS:Win8.1. Returns machines with either of the tags. The default is all machines in the machine group. Filters are not applied for block or unblock actions.

inputs.name: BlockedFor
inputs.label: Block For
inputs.helpMarkDown: Block a machine group either for an instance like a particular Build, or for the definition i.e. for all the instances of the definition.

inputs.name: TimeInHours
inputs.label: Time in Hours
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number of hours that the machines will be blocked for. Value 0 indicates that the machines will be blocked indefinitely.

inputs.name: WaitTimeInMinutes
inputs.label: Wait Time in Minutes (if blocked)
inputs.helpMarkDown: If machine group is already blocked, the number of minutes to wait for the machine group to get unblocked. Default is 30 minutes
